r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $15.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Heddle Marine Services. The average
  contract duration was 0.43 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.2M. The longest
  contract was 2.99 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $11.6M.
lookup_name: 'HEDDLE MARINE SERVICES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '15.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '56'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '31'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '55%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '52%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.39'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '8.2M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.43'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.2M'
s425_max_duration: '2.99'
s422_max_contract_value: '11.6M'
